analysis.description: FreezableToken.toKey (/unique_chucks/42/0xa46f6bc3b1496456f476c06b955ff00960e77bc5.sol#433-446) is declared view but contains assembly code
empty in ERC223Token.transfer (/unique_chucks/42/0xa46f6bc3b1496456f476c06b955ff00960e77bc5.sol#695) is a local variable never initialiazed

FreezableToken.releaseOnce (/unique_chucks/42/0xa46f6bc3b1496456f476c06b955ff00960e77bc5.sol#395-418) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(uint64(block.timestamp) > head) (/unique_chucks/42/0xa46f6bc3b1496456f476c06b955ff00960e77bc5.sol#398-399)

FreezableToken.releaseAll (/unique_chucks/42/0xa46f6bc3b1496456f476c06b955ff00960e77bc5.sol#423-432) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- release != 0 && block.timestamp > release (/unique_chucks/42/0xa46f6bc3b1496456f476c06b955ff00960e77bc5.sol#426-432)

FreezableToken.freeze (/unique_chucks/42/0xa46f6bc3b1496456f476c06b955ff00960e77bc5.sol#446-482) uses timestamp for comparisons
